entry.title: GoodPie/html-typer: HTML Typer is a lightweight TypeScript package that animates HTML content with a smooth typewriter effect. It auto-sanitizes input, supports nested elements, and offers a React component for seamless integration‚Äîmaking your UI engaging and dynamic.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central.
